entities.name: nick
entities.description: Nick is a student who is trying to locate someone. He points out a young woman with long hair to Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who is being pointed out to by Nick. He sees the Gray Lady and tries to talk to her.

entities.name: gray lady
entities.description: The Gray Lady is a ghost that Harry recognizes from passing in the corridor several times. She has long hair and a floor-length cloak.

relationships.description: Nick points out the Gray Lady to Harry.
Harry sees the Gray Lady and tries to talk to her.
Harry recognizes the Gray Lady from passing in the corridor several times.
